author: rwesten
msg: STANBOL-409: Added Implementation for the RDFBackend of LDPath. This also includes some changes to the Entityhub such as updated ModelUtils; The usage of LinkedHashSet instead of ArrayLists for QueryResults;
STANBOL-407: Changes as described in the #1 comment of that issue.
STANBOL-406: Applied the workaround as described in the #1 comment of that issue
* Somehow the old/oudated DefaultSolrDirectoryManager class got not deleted

* Moved the ClassPathSolrIndexConfigProvider to the standalone packacke and renamed it to ClassPathDataFileProvider. Added JavaDoc to this class and the StandaloneManagedSolrServer on how to provide Solr Index Archive outside of OSGI
* The changes are used in the uint tests of the LDPath implementation
* Also corrected an error within the /engines integration tests related to JSON-LD using application/json and NOT application/json-rdf as content type.
